items.content:
Hello everyone and welcome to today's class.

In this wikiwijs the present simple will be explained. You will learn step by step how the present simple works and how you use it. After the explanation, there will be exercises available for you to practise with this tense.

Once you are done with the practise exercises, you will do a writing excerice to test if you understant and know to apply the present simple.

If you have any questions at all, please let me know!

Good luck!

At the end of this lesson:

  • I can write a text where I introduce myself and my daily routine

Firstly, we will start off to see what you already know about the present simple.

Awnser the following questions:

prompt.body: Wat is the present simple in het Nederlands?
To form the present simple we do the following:
With the present simple we reffer to the past?

items.content: It might take a few seconds for the kennisclip to show up, please have some patience!

heading.content: When do we use the present simple?

items.content:
When the sentence states a fact

  • Miley goes to school 5 days a week.
  • Fin lives in Klaaswaal.

When the sentence states a habit

  • E.g. always, on Saturdays, during the week, once a week etc.
  • I cycle to school every day.
  • Roy plays soccer twice a week.

When something does or does not happen regularly

  • E.g. often, frequently, seldom, usually, etc.
  • My friends and I often play games together.
  • My sister cleans the dishes every night.

*Vowels: a, e, I, o, u

Consonants: all other letters

How do we form the present simple?

I/ you/ we/ you/ they → verb

He/ she/ it → verb + s

SHIT-rule exceptions

  • Verb ending in consonant + y → replace -y with -ies
    • study = studies

  • Verb ending in vowel* → add -es
    • go = goes

  • Verb ending in -s, -z, -sh, -ch and -x → add -es
    • miss = misses
    • watch = watches

*Vowels: a, e, I, o, u

Consonants: all other letters

prompt.body:
1. I walk to school every morning.

2. She take the bus when it rains.
The present simple is used when a sentence states a fact, a habit or when something does or does not happen regularly

items.content:
What: make exercise 1 and write a blog

How: use the grammar you just learned to answer the questions and to write the blog

Time:

Help: you can go back to 'explanation' to the rules of the present simple again, if that doesn't help you, ask the teacher

Result: you have practised with the present simple and you have practised with writing

Done?: please fill out the questionaire that you will find under 'finished?'

content.body:
1. They together every Sunday. (play)
  2. She to school every morning. (walk)
  3. Water at 100 degree celcius. (boil)
  4. My teacher very hard. (work)
  5. She to come here. (want)
  6. It two hours to get here. (take)
  7. He medicine. (study)
  8. My friend very well. (dress)
  9. Mike a lot of water. (drink)
  10. I beautiful pictures. (paint)
  11. This jacket 15 euros. (cost)
  12. I English fluently. (speak)
  13. We of a warm summer. (dream)
  14. She at her grandma's house. (eat)
  15. He very loud. (talk)
  16. My brother never for me. (wait)
  17. My mother TV. (watch)
  18. I my face every morning. (wash)
  19. My dog out of a bowl. (eat)
  20. I my mom. (help)

items.content:
If you want to practise some more, here are a few links with more exercises about the present simple. Click on one of the tiles down below and it will automatically open the exercise for you!

Talen wijzer

Alles voor Engels

Continuigstudies

If you have done the exercises and still have questions, feel free to contact me and I will happily help you.

Do you want to practise some more with the present simple? Send me an email and I will have some exerices ready for you!

Once you are completely done I would appriciate it if you could fill out this form and provide me with feedback!

• Present Simple. (2013, 29 april). YouTube. Geraadpleegd op 10 januari 2022, van https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c8amlS5Uwes&feature=youtu.be

  • Present Simple (t.t.). (2018, 21 augustus). allesvoorengels.nl. Geraadpleegd op 10 januari 2022, van https://allesvoorengels.nl/grammatica/present-simple/

  • Present simple oefenen. (z.d.). Talenwijzer. Geraadpleegd op 10 januari 2022, van http://www.talenwijzer.com/present-simple-oefenen.html

  • Simple Present Tense 1. (z.d.-b). English Language Centre at UVic. Geraadpleegd op 10 januari 2022, van https://continuingstudies.uvic.ca/elc/studyzone/330/grammar/pres1

sections.title: When do we use the present simple?
